column2: ggplot(worlddata,aes(x=worlddata$`Happiness Score`,y=worlddata$`Health (Life Expectancy)`,color=`Economy (GDP per Capita)`))+scale_color_gradient(low="yellow", high="blue")+labs( x = "Happiness Score", y = "Life Expectancy(Health)",title ="Happiness Equal to Life Expectancy?")+geom_point(size=2,alpha=.5)+theme_minimal()
